content:
# The movement command to the nearest coal resource has executed successfully. I should now be close enough to place the stone furnace.

# I will attempt to place the stone furnace at the coal position once more.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(x=22.5, y=-14.5))  # Place the furnace at the coal position
print(f'Placed furnace at position: {furnace.position}')  # Confirm the placement of the furnace
